title: Greece - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: As per Embassy + Chologhuri processing fee (TBD)
validity: Determined by embassy, usually up to 90 days in 180-day period

details.title: Eligibility
items: Bangladeshi passport valid for at least 3 months after intended return date, with minimum 2 blank pages and issued within the last 10 years
Complete visa application form with a recent passport-size photo (ICAO standard)
Confirmed travel medical insurance covering all Schengen states with at least €30,000 coverage
Confirmed round-trip air ticket reservation and hotel booking or invitation letter from host
Proof of financial means (3-month bank statement, income tax returns, employment letter or trade documents)
Cover letter stating the travel purpose and itinerary
Marriage certificate or relationship proof if applicable
Minor applicants must submit notarized parental consent and passport/ID copies of parents

details.title: Required Documents
items: Duly filled and signed Schengen visa application form
One passport-size color photo with white background (ICAO compliant)
Valid passport and previous passports with photocopies of all visa pages
Travel medical insurance with minimum €30,000 coverage
Flight and hotel reservations or invitation letter with accommodation details
Original personal bank statement (last 3 months), income tax returns, and employment proof (salary slips, NOC)
For business: Invitation letter, company registration documents, and trade license
For students: Admission letter, student ID, and leave certificate
For medical: Medical certificates and hospital acceptance letters with payment proof
For family/friends visit: Relationship proof, invitation letter, host ID documents
Additional documents based on purpose (official delegations, film crews, seafarers, airport transit etc.)

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
